meta.description: Gabriel Fonseca — Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable backend systems and APIs in PHP, Go, and Node.js. Based in Canada.

about.title: About
about.description: Software engineer with nearly a decade of experience building scalable backend systems and APIs across industries such as fintech, e-commerce, and enterprise SaaS. Proficient in PHP, Node.js, and Go, with hands-on frontend experience using React and Vue. Passionate about code quality — I have championed automated testing practices, contributed to open-source projects, and mentored fellow developers. I thrive in cross-functional teams, turning complex business requirements into reliable, well-tested software.

loopio.description:
Build and ship features for enterprise clients on a B2B SaaS platform
Work across the full stack — backend with Symfony and PHP, frontend with React and TypeScript
Drive performance improvements and increase test coverage in collaboration with product and QA
loopio.tech: Symfony, PHP 8, TypeScript, ReactJs, MySQL, PHPUnit, TDD, Redis, Docker, Code Review, AWS

netcoins.description:
Built and shipped Staking and KYC flows, directly impacting revenue and regulatory compliance
Spearheaded adoption of automated testing across the engineering team, reducing production bugs and establishing a quality-first culture
Refactored legacy codebases, improving maintainability and developer velocity
netcoins.tech: Laravel, PHP 8, TypeScript, VueJs, MySQL, PHPUnit, TDD, Redis, Docker, Code Review, AWS

m56.description:
Designed and built REST API endpoints powering the Fit52 fitness platform
Owned end-to-end integration with Shopify, Stripe, Segment, and RevenueCat for payment processing and subscription management

leroy.description:
Scaled Google Merchant Center product catalog from 200K to 800K products by building high-throughput data pipelines with Go and Apache Kafka
Developed integrations with Facebook Business and BigQuery to power marketing and analytics
Built and maintained REST APIs for a large-scale e-commerce platform with comprehensive test coverage
Improved platform observability by implementing monitoring with Grafana, Datadog, and Confluent Conduktor
Mentored junior developers and contributed to the team's open-source library, Metamorphosis
leroy.tech: Laravel, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Kafka, PHPUnit, TDD, Open Source, Mentorship, DataDog, Grafana, Docker, Redis, Code Review, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Go, AWS

masp.company: Museu de Arte de São Paulo – MASP
masp.description:
Built internal tools that streamlined administrative workflows for one of Latin America's most prominent art museums
Designed and developed interactive visitor kiosks using real-time Web Sockets, enhancing the on-site experience
Delivered fullstack solutions across multiple frameworks deployed on Azure
masp.tech: Laravel, PostgreSQL, Azure, VueJS, React, NodeJS, Web Sockets, API Integrations

dvm.description:
Built and delivered web solutions for clients across multiple industries, progressing from static sites to full dynamic applications
Grew from junior to mid-level, building solid foundations in PHP, JavaScript, and relational databases
dvm.tech: PHP 5.6/7, MySQL, jQuery, JavaScript, CSS, HTML
